messages.content:
Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
logic1 = V(vin2) > vtrans; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
@ (cross(V(vin2) - vtrans, 1))  logic2 = 0; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
input vin1; output vin2; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real tfall = 1u from [0:inf); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
vout_val = (logic1 ^ logic2) ? vlogic_high : vlogic_low; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
      logic1 = V(vin1) < vtrans; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
@ (cross(V(vin1) - vtrans, -1)) logic2 = 0; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
@ (cross(V(vin2) - vtrans, 1)) logic2 = 0; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
	    $stop; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real tfall = 1u from [0:inf); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real vtrans = 10.0; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
   initial begin Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code：
   analog begin

 Correction Criteria：Changed 'analog' to 'initial', causing the block to execute only once at time zero instead of continuously. This prevents the gate from responding to input changes after initialization, resulting in a static output value.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real vlogic_low = vlogic_high; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real trise = 0 from (0:inf); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
input vin1; output vin2; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
output vin1, vin2; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
V(vout) <+ transition( vlogic_low, tdel, trise, tfall); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
   @ ( final_step ) begin Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code：
   @ ( initial_step ) begin

 Correction Criteria：Changed triggering event from initial_step to final_step, causing parameter validity checks to execute at simulation end instead of start. This allows invalid parameters (vlogic_high < vlogic_low or vtrans out-of-range) to go undetected during operation.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
module xnor_gate(vin1, vout, vin2); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
input vout; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
	 if (vtrans > vlogic_high || vtrans < vlogic_low begin Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code：
	 if (vtrans > vlogic_high || vtrans < vlogic_low) begin

 Correction Criteria：Missing closing parenthesis ')' for the conditional expression before 'begin' keyword

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
moduel xnor_gate(vin1, vin2, vout); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
	    $display('Inconsistent $threshold specification w/logic family.\n') Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real tfall = 1u from (0:inf) Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
	 if (vlogic_high < vlogic_low begin Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code：
	 if (vlogic_high < vlogic_low) begin

 Correction Criteria：Missing closing parenthesis ')' in conditional expression

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
	 if (vlogic_high << vlogic_low) begin Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code：
	 if (vlogic_high < vlogic_low) begin

 Correction Criteria：Used bitwise shift operator '<<' instead of comparison operator '<' between real-valued parameters

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real vlogic_high = 5 Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
moduel xnor_gate(vin1, vin2, vout); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real tdel = 2x from [0:inf); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
output vout Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
	    $display('Inconsistent $threshold specification w/logic family.\n); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
    $display('Inconsistent $threshold specification w/logic family.\n; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
@ (cross(V(vin1) - vtrans; 1))  logic1 = 1; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real vtrans = 1..4; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
      V(vout) <+ transition( vout_val, tdel, trise tfall); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
	    $display('Inconsistent $threshold specification w/logic family.\n') Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
electrical vin1, vin2, vout Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
    $display('Range specification error.  vlogic_high = (%E) less than vlogic_low = (%E).\n', vlogic_high, vlogic_low ; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real tfall = 1u from (0:inf; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
   real vout_val Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.
